name: Art Coloring
description:
Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of art puzzle, a relaxing coloring art game that is loved by both kids and adults. Not just like any traditional jigsaw puzzle, this is the place where you can experience calmness of mind while solving picture puzzle.

In Art Puzzle, each painting tells a different story, and each picture puzzle here is the result of multi-layered artwork, drawn specifically for an art game. You will be intrigued curiosity to discover the secret of each picture puzzle when you attempt to solve the silhouettes of objects, complete the jigsaw puzzle and win your prize, join us on this aesthetic journey and decipher this art game!

Relax your mind and engage yourself in the vibrancy of art puzzle when it comes to life. A calming way to release stress and unleash your creativity, match all the missing pieces of jigsaw puzzle into the right places to liven up the pictures.

This jigsaw puzzle app is designed as an anti-stress art game. This is a new level of gaming experience of a classic art jigsaw puzzle. It may seem easy, but interestingly challenging as well. No more boredom and stress, instead, we present you this aesthetic art puzzle, the perfect combination of jigsaw puzzle and art coloring.

HOW TO PLAY ART PUZZLE
- Choose the art puzzle you want to complete.
- Match the missing pieces of jigsaw puzzle to the picture.
- Watch the painting come to live when you finish the art puzzle.
- Share your results and let us know what you think!

Assemble the missing pieces and complete the picture puzzle to make a magnificent colorful animated painting. Explode hundreds of glorious HD arts and stories of Art Puzzle.

So what are you waiting for? Let's begin your journey to conquer the world of art game and be mesmerized by the magic of jigsaw puzzle now!
